title: Won by Love: Norma McCorvey, Jane Roe of Roe V. Wade, Speaks Out for the Unborn As She Shares Her New Conviction for Life
description: The plaintiff in the Supreme Court case that legalized abortion tells how she became a Christian and reversed her position as a spokeswoman for the pro-choice movement, working to expose the immoral machinations of the abortion industry.
author: Norma McCorvey
